img_text: A Message from Chief Outlavw As the Chief of Police for the Portland Police Bureau I am committed to three goals: crime prevention and reduction; community engagement and inclusion; and organizational excellence. We need to be organization that is introspective and accountable. My goal for the Portland Police Bureau to not only be in line with national best practices, but to raise the bar on all levels I have found Portland to be a city that encourages boldness, tenacity and authenticity. People can come here and be who they are. I look forward to helping guide the Bureau with new vision, as we continue to serve our beautiful city My best, Chief Danielle Outlaw
